pages.text: The Ritual of Source Vitaeum bridges the gap between Ars Nouveau's Source magic and Blood Magic's Life Essence. This ritual converts excess Source into LP, enabling hybrid practitioners to leverage both magical systems without requiring complete mastery of either.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: The ritual searches for a Blood Altar within 8 blocks and Source Jars in a 5×5×5 area around the ritual stone.$(br2)Every 2 seconds (affected by altar speed runes), it drains Source from nearby jars and adds LP to the altar based on the conversion rate.

pages.title: Conversion Rate
pages.text: $(blood)Base Rate:$() 10 Source = 1 LP$(br2)$(will)Penalty System:$()$(br)Each Master Ritual Stone within 10 blocks of the altar doubles the conversion cost:$(br)• 0 nearby: 10:1$(br)• 1 nearby: 20:1$(br)• 2 nearby: 40:1$(br)• 3 nearby: 80:1$(br2)This encourages spreading rituals out rather than clustering them.

pages.title: Altar Integration
pages.text: The ritual fully respects altar mechanics:$(br2)• $(animus)Speed Runes:$() Increase conversion frequency$(br)• $(animus)Dislocation Runes:$() Allow faster LP transfer$(br)• $(animus)Capacity Runes:$() Won't overflow the altar$(br2)This makes it a natural extension of your altar's capabilities rather than a separate system.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: All values are configurable:$(br)• Altar search radius$(br)• Base conversion rate$(br)• Penalty radius$(br)• Source drained per cycle$(br2)$(will)Activation Cost:$() 10,000 LP$(br)$(will)Refresh Cost:$() None (uses Source instead)$(br)$(will)Requires:$() Ars Nouveau installed

pages.title: Design Philosophy
pages.text: The poor conversion rate and penalty system ensure neither magic system becomes obsolete. Source Vitaeum is meant for:$(br2)• Converting excess Source when you have plenty$(br)• Emergency LP generation$(br)• Hybrid builds that use both systems$(br2)It encourages true hybrid play rather than replacing one system with the other.
